item.title: Prerequisite 💡 Create a Codepost Account
item.description: Open codepost enter the invitation code & student email yourName@student.unri.ac.id. Check your e-mail. Usually the email appears in the promotion tab. Click verify email. Set your password. And you can login now. Please login. And has been completed, every time there is a new task, this page will be updated automatically.

item.title: Tugas 1 📝 Hello World
item.description: Warning Deadine ⏳ 30 Agustus 2021 23:00 Problem 🤔 Mencetak beberapa baris kalimat ke dalam console. Rules 🚦 Harap ikuti beberapa peraturan dibawah ini sebelum submit file program di CodePost. Nama file program HelloWorld.java Template program public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { // tulis program nya disini ya } } Output 😍 Hasil yang diharapkan.

item.title: About
item.description: Ciao ✌ This website is managed by two teaching assistants, Sammi Aldhi Yanto & M.Fachren. We will distribute materials & assignments regarding programming concepts on this website, stay tuned ya🧐

item.description: Any questions for us? contact Sam via WhatsApp or Faren
